alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Warning issued July 25 at 9:05PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A High Surf Warning remains in effect... * WHAT...Surf heights of 15 to 17 feet. * WHERE...South, east, and west facing shores of Tutuila, Aunuu, and Manua. * WHEN...through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...High. Expect ocean water occasionally sweeping across beaches, strong breaking waves, and strong longshore and potentially deadly rip currents. Some strong coastal erosion is also likely. Large waves may bring some ocean debris onto roadways, and will impact small harbors, making navigating the harbor channel dangerous. Lapataiga mo galu matua maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 905 PO ASO GAFUA IULAI 25 2022 ...O loo faaauau le Lapataiga mo Galu Maualuluga... * MAFUAAGA...O galu matua maualuluga ma malolosi e 15 i le 17 futu. * NOFOAGA...Talafatai i saute, sasa`e, ma sisifo o Tutuila, Aunu`u, ma Manu`a. * TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le taeao i le Aso Lua * AAFIAGA...Tulaga Maualuga. E matua maualuga ma malolosi le fafati o galu, faapea le malosi o le aave o le sami. E solo gataifale. O galu tetele ma maululuga, e ono faatafae mai i uta otaota o le sami. E ono aafia ai fo`i uafu laiti, ma faafaigata ai ona folau vaa laiti. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O galu maualuluga ma le malosi o le aave o le sami e aafia ai le soifuaga o le tagata. Fa`amolemole, ia, faautagia lenei lapataiga mo lou saogalemu.
info.instruction: Large, breaking surf, some significant shorebreak in vulnerable areas, coastal erosion, and dangerous currents make entering the water very hazardous. Anyone entering the water could face significant injury or death.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
